register.name: PID_I_Kp_i
register.description: CC mode P-term for current regulation

register.name: PID_I_Ki_i
register.description: CC mode I-term for current regulation

register.name: PID_I_Kd_i
register.description: CC mode D-term for current regulation

register.name: PID_I_AccMaxV
register.description: CC mode maximum voltage [V] applied to change the current

register.name: PID_I_AccMinV
register.description: CC mode minimum voltage [V] applied to change the current

register.name: PID_V_Kp_v
register.description: CV mode P-term for voltage regulation

register.name: PID_V_Ki_v
register.description: CV mode I-term for voltage regulation

register.name: PID_V_Kd_v
register.description: CV mode D-term for voltage regulation

register.name: PID_V_AccMaxI
register.description: CV mode maximum current [A] driven to change the voltage

register.name: PID_V_AccMinI
register.description: CV mode minimum current [A] driven to change the voltage
